data.marketing-page-home-title: 최고 코워킹 스페이스 운영 소프트웨어 | andcards
data.marketing-page-home-description: 코워킹 스페이스의 자동화를 위한 단 하나의 코워킹 스페이스 관리 앱: 회의실 예약 시스텀, 구글 캘린더 연동, 회의실 디스플레이 앱, 코워킹 멤버십 CRM, 신용카드 승인 결제시스템, 커뮤니티 피드, 모바일 어플리케이션.
data.marketing-page-home-get-customers-time-t: Get more customers for your coworking space
data.marketing-page-home-get-customers-descri: andcards allows to showcase your coworking space to the world through integrated andcards Spaces coworking space directory. Display available membership plans, meeting rooms, photos and video of your space interior.
data.marketing-page-home-headline: Incredibly Easy to Use Coworking Space Software
data.marketing-page-home-headline-2: andcards Suite is the app for coworking spaces built to help you automate management routines - from membership, payments, room bookings through to marketing.
data.marketing-page-home-one-app-time-title: Use just one app for coworking space
data.marketing-page-home-one-app-description: andcards Suite covers all basic needs of your coworking space. Meeting room bookings, membership plan management, IoT devices, community feed with push notifications, card payments — all features are grouped into simple categories.
data.marketing-page-home-request-demo-descrip: Sign up for free and start using andcards in just a few minutes.
data.marketing-page-home-request-demo-note: Most features are free. We also offer {paidFeaturesUrl}.
data.marketing-page-home-save-time-descriptio: Setting everything up, inviting members, and using andcards Suite is super simple and easy. Save yourself a lot of time with 1-click meeting room booking, automatic bonus credit allocation, and in-app card payments.
